downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Shipping Carrier Interface
downloadDescription: This paper provides an overview of the principles used with the shipping carrier interface in Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.

downloadFile.name: Shipping Carrier Interface for Dynamics AX 2009.xps
Shipping Carrier Interface for Dynamics AX 2009.pdf

detailsSection:
Use the information in this paper when integrating Microsoft Dynamics AX with shipping carrier software. This software is provided by shipping carriers, and you can use it with Microsoft Dynamics AX to process packages and display the shipping status.

This white paper is intended for professionals who are involved in the implementation and support of the shipping carrier interface functionality, or those who advise customers or make modifications to that area of Microsoft Dynamics AX.
detailsSection_file_name: Shipping Carrier Interface for Dynamics AX 2009.xps
Shipping Carrier Interface for Dynamics AX 2009.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
